entries.meaning: (informal, nonstandard or eye dialect) Alternative form of girl.
(LGBT slang) Term of address between gay men or transgender women.

examples: For example, “queer” would include self-identified lesbians and gays who also have sex with the “opposite sex,” sexual practices and relationships that include kink, s/m, polyamory, and pansexuality, gender play and fuck including femmes and those feminine of center, butches and those masculine of center, queens, femboys, gurls, bois, sissies, tomboys, crossdressers, drag queens and kings, and genderfluid people.

verbs.description: gurl (third-person singular simple present gurls, present participle gurling, simple past and past participle gurled)
